scripts.mud: npm run build -- --pretty false && node dist/mud.js
scripts.mud:dev: npm run build -- --pretty false && node dist/mud.js start dev
scripts.mud:prod: npm run build -- --pretty false && node dist/mud.js start prod
scripts.mud:client: npm run build -- --pretty false && node dist/mud-client.js
scripts.mud:dev:watch: npm run build -- --pretty false && node dist/mud-watch.js dev
